description: Enhanced Ollama prompts with few-shot examples for RF component extraction

cable.system_prompt: You are an expert RF engineer specializing in coaxial cable specifications. Extract technical data from datasheets and return ONLY valid JSON. Be precise with numeric values and frequency-dependent data.
cable.user_prompt:
Extract specifications from this coaxial cable datasheet.

## EXAMPLE INPUT:
Times Microwave LMR-400 Specification
Impedance: 50 ohms
Velocity: 85%
Outer Diameter: 0.405 inch
Attenuation at 150 MHz: 0.7 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 450 MHz: 1.3 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 900 MHz: 1.9 dB/100ft
Power at 150 MHz: 1800W
Power at 900 MHz: 750W

## EXAMPLE OUTPUT:
{"component_type":"cable","manufacturer":"Times Microwave Systems","model":"LMR-400","part_number":"LMR-400","description":"0.405\" diameter flexible coaxial cable, PE jacket","impedance_ohms":50,"velocity_factor":0.85,"outer_diameter_inches":0.405,"loss_db_per_100ft":{"150":0.7,"450":1.3,"900":1.9},"power_rating_watts":{"150_mhz":1800,"900_mhz":750}}

## SECOND EXAMPLE INPUT:
Andrew LDF4-50A HELIAX
50 Ohm corrugated copper
Velocity of Propagation: 88%
OD: 0.5 in
Loss per 100ft: 0.32 dB @ 100 MHz, 0.68 dB @ 450 MHz, 1.18 dB @ 1000 MHz
Avg Power: 3100W @ 100 MHz, 1650W @ 450 MHz

## SECOND EXAMPLE OUTPUT:
{"component_type":"cable","manufacturer":"Andrew/CommScope","model":"LDF4-50A","part_number":"LDF4-50A","description":"1/2\" HELIAX corrugated copper coaxial cable","impedance_ohms":50,"velocity_factor":0.88,"outer_diameter_inches":0.5,"loss_db_per_100ft":{"100":0.32,"450":0.68,"1000":1.18},"power_rating_watts":{"100_mhz":3100,"450_mhz":1650}}

## NOW EXTRACT FROM THIS DATASHEET:
{datasheet_text}

Return ONLY the JSON object with no markdown formatting or explanation.
extraction_hints: Look for attenuation tables (dB/100ft or dB/100m - convert to 100ft)
Impedance is almost always 50 ohms for RF cables

validation.loss_pattern: loss_db values should increase with frequency
validation.power_pattern: power_rating values should decrease with frequency

antenna.system_prompt: You are an expert antenna engineer. Extract antenna specifications from datasheets and return ONLY valid JSON. Pay attention to gain units (dBi vs dBd).
antenna.user_prompt:
Extract specifications from this antenna datasheet.

## EXAMPLE INPUT:
Jampro JCPV-4 FM Broadcast Antenna
Gain: 4.0 relative to dipole (6 dBi)
Frequency: 88-108 MHz
Polarization: Circular
VSWR: 1.08:1
Input Impedance: 50 ohms
Connector: 1-5/8" EIA flange
Power Rating: 60 kW
Wind Survival: 125 mph

## EXAMPLE OUTPUT:
{"component_type":"antenna","manufacturer":"Jampro Antennas","model":"JCPV-4","part_number":"JCPV-4","description":"FM broadcast antenna, 4-bay, circular polarization, panel design","gain_dbi":6.0,"gain_relative_dipole":4.0,"frequency_range_mhz":[88,108],"polarization":"circular","vswr":1.08,"impedance_ohms":50,"connector_type":"EIA 1-5/8\" flange","power_rating_watts":60000,"wind_survival_mph":125,"pattern":"omni-directional"}

## SECOND EXAMPLE - UHF ANTENNA:
Sinclair SD220-SF2P0SNM
Gain: 6 dBd (8.15 dBi)
Frequency: 406-512 MHz
Polarization: Vertical
VSWR: <1.5:1
Power: 150W
Connector: N-Female

## SECOND EXAMPLE OUTPUT:
{"component_type":"antenna","manufacturer":"Sinclair Technologies","model":"SD220-SF2P0SNM","description":"UHF collinear antenna, vertical polarization","gain_dbi":8.15,"gain_dbd":6.0,"frequency_range_mhz":[406,512],"polarization":"vertical","vswr":1.5,"impedance_ohms":50,"connector_type":"N-Female","power_rating_watts":150,"pattern":"omni-directional"}

## NOW EXTRACT FROM THIS DATASHEET:
{datasheet_text}

Return ONLY the JSON object. Convert dBd to dBi by adding 2.15.
extraction_hints: Gain relative to dipole: multiply by gain to get linear ratio
Look for radiation patterns (omni vs directional)
Broadcast antennas often use EIA flange connectors

transmitter.system_prompt: You are an expert broadcast engineer. Extract transmitter specifications from datasheets and return ONLY valid JSON.
transmitter.user_prompt:
Extract specifications from this transmitter datasheet.

## EXAMPLE INPUT:
BW Broadcast TX1000 V5
Power Output: 1000W (60 dBm, 30 dBW)
Frequency Range: 87.5-108 MHz
Efficiency: 75%
Mains Power: 1800W @ 230VAC
Audio Inputs: AES/EBU, Analog XLR
Output Connector: 7/8" EIA
Harmonic Suppression: >60 dB

## EXAMPLE OUTPUT:
{"component_type":"transmitter","manufacturer":"BW Broadcast","model":"TX1000 V5","part_number":"TX1000-V5","description":"1kW FM broadcast transmitter, digital exciter","power_output_watts":1000,"power_output_dbm":60,"power_output_dbw":30,"frequency_range_mhz":[87.5,108],"efficiency_percent":75,"mains_voltage":"230VAC","power_consumption_watts":1800,"output_impedance_ohms":50,"connector_type":"EIA 7/8\"","harmonic_suppression_dbc":-60,"audio_input":["AES/EBU","Analog XLR"]}

## NOW EXTRACT FROM THIS DATASHEET:
{datasheet_text}

Return ONLY the JSON object. Calculate dBm = 10*log10(watts*1000), dBW = 10*log10(watts).
extraction_hints: Power: watts, dBm, dBW are related

lightning_arrestor.system_prompt: You are an expert in RF lightning protection. Extract specifications and return ONLY valid JSON.
lightning_arrestor.user_prompt:
Extract specifications from this lightning arrestor/surge protector datasheet.

## EXAMPLE INPUT:
PolyPhaser IS-B50LN-C0
Type: Bulkhead mount, gas tube
Insertion Loss: 0.2 dB typical
Frequency: DC-1000 MHz
Connectors: N-Female both sides
Surge Voltage: 5kV
DC: Pass

## EXAMPLE OUTPUT:
{"component_type":"lightning_arrestor","manufacturer":"PolyPhaser","model":"IS-B50LN-C0","part_number":"IS-B50LN-C0","description":"Bulkhead lightning arrestor, DC pass, N-Female to N-Female","insertion_loss_db":0.2,"frequency_range_mhz":[0,1000],"connector_type":"N-Female both ends","voltage_rating_kv":5,"dc_pass":true}

## SECOND EXAMPLE - DC BLOCK:
PolyPhaser IS-B50LN-C2
DC Block version
Insertion Loss: 0.2 dB
Frequency: 30-1000 MHz
Voltage: 5kV

## SECOND EXAMPLE OUTPUT:
{"component_type":"lightning_arrestor","manufacturer":"PolyPhaser","model":"IS-B50LN-C2","part_number":"IS-B50LN-C2","description":"Bulkhead lightning arrestor, DC block, N-Female to N-Female","insertion_loss_db":0.2,"frequency_range_mhz":[30,1000],"connector_type":"N-Female both ends","voltage_rating_kv":5,"dc_pass":false}

## NOW EXTRACT FROM THIS DATASHEET:
{datasheet_text}

Return ONLY the JSON object.
extraction_hints: DC pass vs DC block is critical

isolator.system_prompt: You are an expert in RF isolation devices. Extract specifications and return ONLY valid JSON.
isolator.user_prompt:
Extract specifications from this isolator/circulator datasheet.

## EXAMPLE INPUT:
Bird 8345 RF Isolator
Frequency: 806-960 MHz
Insertion Loss: 0.5 dB
Isolation: 20 dB minimum
Power: 100W average
VSWR: 1.25:1
Connectors: N-type

## EXAMPLE OUTPUT:
{"component_type":"isolator","manufacturer":"Bird Technologies","model":"8345","description":"UHF ferrite isolator, 100W","insertion_loss_db":0.5,"isolation_db":20,"frequency_range_mhz":[806,960],"power_rating_watts":100,"connector_type":"N-type","vswr":1.25}

## NOW EXTRACT FROM THIS DATASHEET:
{datasheet_text}

Return ONLY the JSON object.

combiner.system_prompt: You are an expert in RF combining systems. Extract specifications and return ONLY valid JSON.
combiner.user_prompt:
Extract specifications from this combiner datasheet.

## EXAMPLE INPUT:
Jampro RCAC-2 FM Combiner
Type: Constant impedance, 2 stations
Insertion Loss: 1.0 dB per port
Isolation: 80 dB between ports
Frequency: 88-108 MHz
Power: 30 kW per port
Connector: 1-5/8" EIA

## EXAMPLE OUTPUT:
{"component_type":"combiner","manufacturer":"Jampro Antennas","model":"RCAC-2","part_number":"RCAC-2","description":"FM 2-station combiner, constant impedance design","insertion_loss_db":1.0,"isolation_db":80,"frequency_range_mhz":[88,108],"power_rating_watts":30000,"number_of_ports":2,"connector_type":"EIA 1-5/8\" flange"}

## NOW EXTRACT FROM THIS DATASHEET:
{datasheet_text}

Return ONLY the JSON object.

filter.system_prompt: You are an expert in RF filters. Extract specifications and return ONLY valid JSON.
filter.user_prompt:
Extract specifications from this RF filter datasheet.

## EXAMPLE INPUT:
Bandpass Filter BPF-FM
Type: Cavity bandpass
Passband: 88-108 MHz
Insertion Loss: 0.4 dB
Rejection: >50 dB outside passband
Power: 5 kW

## EXAMPLE OUTPUT:
{"component_type":"filter","manufacturer":"Unknown","model":"BPF-FM","description":"FM bandpass filter, cavity design","insertion_loss_db":0.4,"rejection_db":50,"passband_mhz":[88,108],"power_rating_watts":5000}

## NOW EXTRACT FROM THIS DATASHEET:
{datasheet_text}

Return ONLY the JSON object.

generic.system_prompt: You are an expert RF engineer. Identify the component type and extract all relevant specifications. Return ONLY valid JSON.
